mapper.update: update borrower set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, detail = #{detail},book = #{book} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from borrower where name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) or id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) or age like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) or sex like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) or detail like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) or book like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%'))
